name: Multiversal Gloryhole
mes:

*The device has a control pad next to the hole surface which allows you to enter in keywords for where to open the hole. MODE: None chosen
MOOD:  No Target
AROUSAL: No Target 
THOUGHTS: No target
STATUS: No Target.`
